title: Technic Launcher cracked (Updated Dec 11 + New Users Fix)
description:
New username creation now works and all usernames are "rememberable"

Snapshot from Dec 11 2013

Neutered authentication
Neutered Google Analytics tracking
Removed password input

EXE built on Win7 64bit
JAR built on Fedora 19 64bit
As usual, JAR is included for those who either dislike EXE files or wish to use this on a non-Windows platform.
And as the last release, this one includes the full source as it sat build-time. File size is reduced since last time I forgot to do a clean after building.

For those limited to 1.5GB RAM option:
You MUST use 64bit Java to allow more than 1.5GB memory usage. This is not up to me. It is a limitation of Java and I cannot work around this. 

This update is a bug fix of the Dec 11 release being unable to create and log in with a new user. Existing "remembered" users did not have an issue.
It was a stupid little mistake from trying to rush an update out as damage control for Mojang's recent changes. I have verified that multiple new users can be added, remembered, and used on both Windows and Linux.

To build source:
Run "mvn clean install" in LauncherCore-master
Run "mvn clean package" in TechnicLauncher-master
Your new build will be in TechnicLauncher-master/target
You will have both an EXE and JAR if built on Windows.

If you have any issues:
Use the comments section below OR
email: 6.forty AT g mail OR
jabber: 6.forty AT jabber.de

Also if anyone can tell me how to remove torrents, I would appreciate it greatly. I can't remember the last time the "delete torrent" button has actually worked.
